query:
UPDATE selected_topics st
JOIN users u ON CAST(st.submitters AS UNSIGNED) = u.id
SET st.submitters = COALESCE(u.name, u.username, '未知用户')
WHERE st.submitters REGEXP '^[0-9]+$';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2QT84xGnBKUugNF.root --database g5LX4x79UdX68RxpKYLQF9 --execute UPDATE selected_topics st
JOIN users u ON CAST(st.submitters AS UNSIGNED) = u.id
SET st.submitters = COALESCE(u.name, u.username, '未知用户')
WHERE st.submitters REGEXP '^[0-9]+$';
